cards.title: Welcome to my Website!
cards.description:
This website is a work-in-progress! Everything on here is created by me, including the entire actual website design, unless specified otherwise.

PS. Sorry for the very serious picture, I'll update that soon with one a bit less intense!

cards.title: About Me
cards.description: My name is Ethan Thomas Stewart, a recent first-generation graduate with a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science. I am a highly motivated team player, and I strive to bring out the best in the people around me by appreciating who they are and what they are capable of. I am the type of person who needs to be invested in meaningful work to be fulfilled; I cannot be content allowing life to pass me by. It is my mission to annihilate problems and move forward at full speed. I spend a large amount of my free time reading, learning, and exploring new opportunities to grow as a person. I am confident in my abilities because I know that I will put in the work to ensure I am valuable to the people around me, and communicate with them to make sure I am performing at the best of my capabilities.

cards.title: Career Goals
cards.description: My primary long-term career goal is to acquire a position in Cybersecurity that works to defend my country. I am currently applying for entry-level jobs at workplaces that have a history of excellent work, where I will fully engage with the environment around me to strive for greatness in more crucial roles. When I am hired in an entry-level position, I will work tirelessly to outperform expectations, with the goal of achieving a higher-level position and repeating the process.

cards.title: Hobbies
cards.description:
As mentioned in the "About Me" section, I love to read, learn, and develop myself as a person. I love learning about interpersonal dynamics and about ways to hack the mind to increase one's capabilities. On a more casual note, I do love some more traditionally fun activities:

I love to ski, spend time at the gym, hike, and go out with friends to enjoy music, even though I'm a terrible dancer. My love for learning is not exclusive to my career, either; I practice video editing, 3d model design, modding video games, and I of course create small (and sometimes janky) software projects on the side. I also play sudoku and chess often in my free time, and I am rated in the top 7% of players on Chess.com!

cards.title: My Stance on the use of Artificial Intelligence
